ygData.subject: Re: Level 12 spells
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah.. its not too hard to get cash.  I m at level 16 now.. and have probably blown more than 200pp.  I ve still got over 60 in the bank, but I ve got all my
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah.. its not too hard to get cash. I'm at level 16 now.. and have probably blown more than 200pp. I've still got over 60 in the bank, but I've got all my level 16 spells, enough equipment (Damask, RTS, bearhide, etc)

Maybe it does have something to do with levels... but I cant remember a time before level 8 or so.. that I had problems with money.

Drev

> ----------

> To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Level 12 spells
>
> From: "Joe Wallace" <joew88@...>
>
> 70pp?!?!? How long have you been saving money? And you are a wizard?
>

>
>
> > Why is it everyone has problems with getting cash? Through normal
> > adventuring I, at level 13, have just over 70pp more than enuff to buy my
